about_the_game:
Climb the ranks and claim your spot among the greatest mechanical fighters in this unconventional Atompunk / Electro Swing themed Rhythm tapping Auto-Battler!🎵 Pick your nation and outfit your boxer with a variety of different punchcard abilities, league belts and robot parts of which can possess different behavioural characteristics or effect your speed, strength, endurance.

Your loyal crew stationed on the backside of your fighter will do their best to pilot and execute basic attacks. You'll be tasked to manage their input, replenish system resources, apply strategic dodges and load and activating abilities by completing light rhythm tapping challenges synced with music beats.

Components of your robot are likely to succumb to the heavy hits of your opponent and eventually break. Fortunately repairs can be applied between round breaks. So too will any crew members dazed from battle recover during a round break, restoring their role specific perks they provide (Captain, Driver, Arms or Systems).

With depletion of systems health comes a countdown, giving the downed robot 10 seconds to reboot or lose the match.

In career mode you'll navigate through a series of daily manager events that earn you resources to unlock new robot parts, robot abilities and passive crew skills.

Welcome to Emprum Stadium, host of the Electro Bop boxing league!
